snippet: A prominent blogger, Ali Abdulemam, who had been sentenced in absentia to 15 years in prison for his activism in Bahrain, has fled the country by hiding in a compartment in a car
abstract: A prominent blogger, Ali Abdulemam, who had been sentenced in absentia to 15 years in prison for his activism in Bahrain, has fled the country by hiding in a compartment in a car

headline.main: Blogger Emerges From Hiding After Fleeing Bahrain

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
